title: Quick-fix for iFit Vue Button Responsiveness
description: Visit our iFit Support page for more help with your iFit Vue.

asset.author: iFit
asset.description: Visit our iFit Support page for more help with your iFit Vue.

transcripts: In this video we're going to walk you through some troubleshooting and hard resetting the iFit Vue. Press the square button on the screen to wake up your iFit Vue once it is awake you'll see the time and date on the screen of your iFit Vue. Once the screen is displaying the date and time double tap the square button this will display the current battery life. Now that you're on the screen showing the battery life firmly press and hold the square button once on the screen of the Vue you will see the current version of firmware on the screen. The screen will display the words iFit Vue your iFit Vue has now been reset. After iFit Vue comes across the screen the date and time will automatically come up on the screen the time and date will default to twelve o'clock 0101 if the date and time do not change please follow the instructions to complete this process again. To resync the Vue with the iFit track app simply open the track app and swipe down once from the dashboard screen.
